titles: Lucida intervalla, containing divers miscellaneous poems, written at Finsbury and Bethlem by the Doctors patient extraordinary.
author: Carkesse, James, fl. 1679.
notes: Poems concerning the author's treatment in Bedlam and directed chiefly against Dr. Thomas Allen.
Attributed to James Carkesse.  Cf. Halkett & Laing, BM.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
